Message.Title: Ebay Customer Service
Message.Msg: I've been a full time seller on Ebay for 14 years now. The last 50 calls to Ebay have always been answered by someone in Draper Utah In fact I haven't had a foreign CS in over 5 years I guess all TRS sellers get US customer service reps when they call

Topic.Title: C'MON EBAY - YOU CAN'T LET A ZERO FEEDBACKER DAMAGE A POWERSELLER !!!!!

Message.Msg: Well, you have made it clear, you do not sell on Ebay. If you did, you'd know International business is the largest growing segment. People around the world are getting richer while Americans are getting poorer. 7.5 % REPORTED unemployment is historically very high.
OK, you got me there I hate it when someone else is right ~ LOL
